price: Na sema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Niteremshe mteremsho wenye baraka, na Wewe ni Mbora wa wateremshaji.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ
footnotes: Na useme: Ewe Mola Mlezi! Nijaalie nishuke mashukio yenye baraka, pahala pazuri pa kukaa wakati wa kuteremka nchi kavu. Na unitunukie amani hapo. Kwani ni Wewe tu peke yako unaye weza kututeremsha pahala pa kheri na amani na salama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi anzil'nī munzalan mubārakan wa-anta khayru al-munzilīna
